quest.name: My First Spear
journal: Ywain wishes to assign you your first trial as a member of the Lancers' Guild.
For your first trial as a member of the Lancers' Guild, Ywain bids you slay three squirrels, three ladybugs, and three funguars.
You have succeeded in slaying the specified creatures. Report back to Ywain at the Lancers' Guild.

According to Ywain, the true measure of a lancer is how well he can pierce his enemy's defenses. If you wish to become a lancer worthy of the name, you must spare no effort in your training. Taking these words to heart, you embark upon your chosen path.

※The next lancer quest will be available from Ywain upon reaching level 5.
objectives: Slay ground squirrels as a lancer.
Slay little ladybugs as a lancer.
Slay forest funguars as a lancer.
Report to Ywain at the Lancers' Guild.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: So you were able to discern one end of the spear from the other. Good.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You are doubtless eager to put your new weapon to the test─which is well, for I too have a test in mind, or rather...a trial.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: In order to develop an affinity with your weapon and learn to gauge such things as distance, you are to go forth and pit yourself against the creatures that roam just outside the city.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: The squirrels, ladybugs, and funguars should provide you with a suitable challenge.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Put down, let us say, three of each, and then report back to me.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: So you are back. I trust you have learned something of the essence of our art.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: A lancer learns best when he is doing, each thrust making him stronger. Such things as strategy and technique will come in time. And never forget courage─without it, you cannot hope to realize your potential.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: ...Your look betrays no hint of doubt. That is well. It is clear you see the truth in my words.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: That will be all for the present. Now, take up your weapon, sally forth, and cut a path for yourself.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: When next we meet, I hope to see you stronger for your time out in the world.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next lancer quest will be available from Ywain upon reaching level 5.
